name: Adventure Time Listing App
description: Personal listing app of information on your favorite Adventure Time characters. Able to edit existing characters and add others on your own.

name: InuChat
description: Created a game chat app. Connect to other users and chat on the web.The project was authenticated and deployed to firebase

name: GameLounge
description: Listing website for favorite games. Find all games, from previous releases, current popular games, and amazing releases to come. Completed different pages including My games, and a sign-up form page.

name: Plantie
description: Plant care and tracking App. Created the backend Schema and assisted in the frontend creation. The group worked perfectly in sync and we all knew what tasks we wanted to take on. The app is able to use the schema to show daily tasks as well as plant data.

name: Pokedex
description: A Pokedex app, that has a list of all pokemon. Click on the name of a pokemon and then add to team. It will appear on the My Team page.

name: Weather App
description: Weather app created in React that predicts weather for today, just enter city and wether you want fahrenheit, or celcius
